commit.message:
re PR c++/64667 (-Winit-self ignored for reference fields)

/cp
2015-04-29  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/64667
	* init.c (perform_member_init): Handle references for -Winit-self.

/testsuite
2015-04-29  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/64667
	* g++.dg/warn/Winit-self-3.C: New.

From-SVN: r222577
